attributes.action: The Creation of  brand new Town Planning up to Tight up on Shop use in high streets
attributes.additional_details: The Focus of this petition is to get the department of local  government and communites  to tight up the class of use shops which need planning permission for Cafe, Resturants, Betting shops, estate agents, and find ways given local councils and communities the right to choose what shops and high street local businesses they want and setting up a local shops and business community group consisting of local people in every area of uk town or city to set up regeneration and business gateways for local area, Get act to encourage bring more leisure facilities like cinema or Boutique Tenpin bowling alley and indoor water parks or indoor event centres,indoor ski slopes.
